Articles.Content:
why isn't cameras a thing yet? I would use this on all my rovers and it would make it much  easier to make cinematic scenes. 

it could also be a new science thing. it would also be very cool to see camera quality progress in science/carrer mode. 

and in ksp 2 we have multiplayer so why not add cameras that can spy on the other players.

Theres hullcam VDS, Ltech, and tarsier space tech that have functioning cameras

And the neptune camera but thats not a part, its some code for modders to add to parts and stuff for functioning cameras
